title: Benno Fürmann
summary: Benjamin "Benno" Fürmann (German: [ˈbɛ.no ˈfyːɐ̯ˌman] (listen); born 17 January 1972) is a German film and television actor.  He is known for his lead role in the 2008 film The North Face, where he plays Toni Kurz based on the 1936 Eiger climbing disaster in Switzerland, the lead actor in Christian Petzold's Jerichow, Agnieszka Holland's In Darkness, and as the voice actor for Puss in Boots of the Shrek franchise in the German Dub.
